text: C J Townrow & Sons are a small chain of department stores based in Essex. The business opened during 1871 and is run by the same family. The business sells menswear, ladies clothes, shoes, kitchenware and linens. It was until recently based in Braintree, but continues to operate with smaller branches in Maldon Essex, Frinton Essex and St. Ives Cambridgeshire, which was purchased from the administrators of another department store chain Eaden Lilley. There were previously branches in Culver Street in Colchester, and High Street in Halstead. ==References== Townrow Category:Retail companies established in 1871
